#Instructions for installing

= Instructions =

Before installing the lost.sis you need to install Python to your phone. The Python interpreter can be downloaded from https://garage.maemo.org/projects/pys60. Download the suitable version for you phone for example Python_1.9.2_3rdEdFP2.sis

Note that if your phone is 3rd edition phone then you must sign the sis package with [https://www.symbiansigned.com/app/page/public/openSignedOnline.do Open signed]. Select all capabilities.
